testsuite.name: Scenario: Test Math in editor is not causing a breakline when deleting characters in front of it

testcase.name: Given I am logged in as the default administrator
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test Math in editor is not causing a breakline when deleting characters in front of it

testcase.name: And I am on the Content Repository page of Demonstration Class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test Math in editor is not causing a breakline when deleting characters in front of it

testcase.name: When I choose creating new question/Text from the main dropdown button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test Math in editor is not causing a breakline when deleting characters in front of it

testcase.name: And Question Designer is opened
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test Math in editor is not causing a breakline when deleting characters in front of it

testcase.name: And I click inside the question text editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test Math in editor is not causing a breakline when deleting characters in front of it

testcase.name: And I enter "Hello World" inside the question text editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test Math in editor is not causing a breakline when deleting characters in front of it

testcase.name: When I click Equation Editor button to open the Math Editor dialog and assert that the Math Editor dialog is visible
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test Math in editor is not causing a breakline when deleting characters in front of it

testcase.name: And I type "a/b" in the Equation Editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test Math in editor is not causing a breakline when deleting characters in front of it

testcase.name: And I click Done in the Math Editor dialog
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test Math in editor is not causing a breakline when deleting characters in front of it

testcase.name: Then I see the "a/b" Math Widget in the question text section
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test Math in editor is not causing a breakline when deleting characters in front of it

testcase.name: And I backspace delete the "Hello World" text before the Math Widget
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test Math in editor is not causing a breakline when deleting characters in front of it

testcase.name: And I assert that the question editor does not contain a break line
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test Math in editor is not causing a breakline when deleting characters in front of it

testcase.name: classMethod
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test Math in editor is not causing a breakline when deleting characters in front of it
